text:
Hi Adam, your ESXI hosts need to be on version 8 and you should not see penalties. See https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-stack/starting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when/m-p/3956844/highlight/true
 This one is related to Hyper-V but also contains a link for VMware. Best regards, Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus Senior IT Consultant Von:  < %2498b61270%24ca223750%24%40chynet.de
